attributes.action: Ask the Office of Fair Trading to Investigate Apple Inc's. Punitive Pricing Policies for UK iTunes Customers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apple is a global technology company which offers a digital download service for music purchases, film rental and purchases and TV programe purchases; via it's iTunes computer application. Apple has and continues to overcharge UK customers for these products and services, when compared to other similar companies who provide a similar service. Apple also charges UK customers more for identical products and services, than it does to it's other customers around the world.
